distinct
from orders
order by ${orderByClause}

select distinct orders.id,orders.count,orders.state,orders.price, goods.name, goods.image_path from goods, orders where orders.item_id = goods.id and orders.del_flag = false and goods.del_flag = false and orders.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
